item.title: Report E-2024120513
item.description:
Report E-2024120513

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-17
  • City: BUFFALO
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Pitt Ohio Express
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon arrival at the intermediate terminal, the pail was discovered to be leaking inside the trailer. Further inspection of the pail indicated that the bottom of the pail had a small cut in the bottom of it. It is unclear if the drum was damaged from a protruding nail in the skid or if it was a structural defect. The released material and damaged container were immediately cleaned up and placed into a container for proper disposal. Due to the hazard of material, the packaging specs were not able to be obtained.
